Headline: Blue Line Experiencing Delays, Boarding Change at Rosemont
ShortDescription: Blue Line service running w/delays due to signal problems at O'Hare, board all Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains on the O'Hare-bound side at Rosemont.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line service running w/delays due to signal problems at O'Hare, board all Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains on the O'Hare-bound side at Rosemont.

At this time shuttle buses and shuttle trains are available between O'Hare and Rosemont to provide connecting service to O'Hare.

Board/Exit shuttle trains to O'Hare on the Forest Park-bound platform at Rosemont.

Also consider other alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines. 

This may include: 
#56 Milwaukee
#81W West Lawrence 
#81 Lawrence 
#88 Higgins
#90 Harlem 
#92 Foster 

We're working to restore normal service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
